body: You have teeth and claws that suit you well to digging.
name: Burrowing Teeth
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Ratfolk/New Racial Rules/Ratfolk Feats/Burrowing Teeth

sections.body: You gain a burrow speed equal to 1/2 your base speed. You can burrow through sand, dirt, clay, gravel, or similar materials, but not solid stone. You do not leave a hole behind, nor is your passage marked on the surface.
sections.name: Benefit
